column4: hi all, i have a friend who accidentally deleted the NTFS partition that he *was* using to boot into ubuntu (using the nt loader)...he's in ubuntu at the moment. what's the easiest way to get grub installed and configured?
sudo update-grub && sudo grub-install /dev/hda  or /dev/sda , depending
if he has windows on there, it may miss it. If so, ask again
